SEARCH
Package main.java.models

Class Order

java.lang.Object
main.java.models.Order
public class Order extends Object
The Order class represents an order made in a restaurant. It is a business object that contains all necessary accessors and mutators for CRUD Operations performed by OrderDAO. Order class is in a 'has-a' relation with OrderDAO (Composition). It contains information such as the order ID, items ordered, comments, branch, dine-in status, completion status, time, and order status.
Since:
23-Apr-2024
Version:
1.4
Author:
SDDA Team 1

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(int orderId, String branch)
      Constructs an Order object with the given order ID and branch. Initializes other fields with default values, except time which takes the current time.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The unique ID of the order
      branch - The branch where the order was placed

    • Order

      public Order(int orderId, OrderStatus orderStatus, String branch, boolean isDineIn, boolean isCompleted, LocalDateTime time)
      Constructor that constructors Order object with the given parameters. Overloads previous constructor Order(int orderId, String branch).
      Parameters:
      orderId - The unique ID of the order
      orderStatus - The status of the order
      branch - The branch of the order
      isDineIn - Indicates whether the order is for dine-in
      isCompleted - Indicates whether the order is completed
      time - Indicates time when order is last updated

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representation of the Order object, including detailed descriptions of its contents. This method returns a string that includes the order ID, the list of items (formatted by a helper method), the comments associated with the order, the branch, whether it is dine-in, its completion status, and the order status.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String - a formatted string containing all the details of the order.

    • itemsToString

      public String itemsToString()
      Helper method to generate a formatted string of all items in the order (comma-seperated). This method iterates over the list of MenuItem objects, invoking the `toString` method of each MenuItem to compile a string representation of all items in the order.
      Returns:
      String - a formatted string representing the list of MenuItem objects in the order.

    • commentsToString

      public String commentsToString()
      Helper method to generate a formatted string of the comments, separated by commas for a particular order. This method filters out null and empty comment entries before formatting.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing the non-null and non-empty comments for a particular order.
